column4: Because after all these years, Firefox still leaks memory like an 80 year old man'
it doesn't leak memory, it just fragments. Like any program will, unless it can move the memory around like mono or java virtual machines

yes. Fragmenting. Also flash plugin is not really FF's fault is it
